definition: canon/law/standard work of scholarship/literary quotation or allusion/ceremony/to be in charge of/to mortgage or pawn

sentences.english: The wine is elegant with persistent velvety tannins.
sentences.chinese: 酒味典雅，含有柔和的丹寧酸。

sentences.english: Pays great attention to the form in this time poet to be elegant, strives for perfection to the poem skill.
sentences.chinese: 在這個時期詩人注重形式典雅，對詩藝精益求精。

sentences.english: Cover marriage gauze originally luxuriant elegance, the bride of set off is more lovely.
sentences.chinese: 本套婚紗華麗典雅，映襯的新娘更加楚楚動人。

sentences.english: With kettle body, portable and novelty, fashionable and elegant.
sentences.chinese: 優美流線型壺體，小巧玲瓏，時尚大方，精緻典雅。

sentences.english: This hairdresser designs this elegant and graceful hair-style.
sentences.chinese: 這種典雅大方的髮式出自這位理髮師之手。

sentences.english: The decoration of the hotel is dignity and elegance.
sentences.chinese: 酒店裝修高貴典雅，有直達電梯到各樓層。

sentences.english: Noble and elegant, the medals are a blending of traditional Chinese culture and Olympism.
sentences.chinese: 高貴而典雅，獎牌是中國傳統文化和奧林匹克的融合。

sentences.english: The blue and white Yun silk quilt, exquisite luxury, quiet and elegant.
sentences.chinese: 此款青花雅韻蠶絲被，細膩奢華，安靜典雅。

sentences.english: Noble, elegant living, Lily in the head, Xinxin moved.
sentences.chinese: 高貴氣質，典雅生活，麗麗在目，鑫鑫動容。

sentences.english: Black and white and dichromatic collocation, let sofa bed put on a kind of elegance again.
sentences.chinese: 黑白兩色的搭配，又讓沙發牀添上一種典雅。

sentences.english: High quality non-magnetic extra-thick frosted stainless steel casing, elegant and durable.
sentences.chinese: 優質不帶磁加厚磨砂不鏽鋼外殼，典雅耐用。

sentences.english: West Lake in Hangzhou with enchanting pavilions set in quiet surroundings.
sentences.chinese: 杭州西湖，水榭歌臺，人工賦予它典雅美。

sentences.english: Metal texture panel image design reflects the elegance and fortitude.
sentences.chinese: 金屬質地面板形象設計，典雅中透出剛毅氣質。

sentences.english: Set off by two gardens, the three European style building look elegant and magnificent.
sentences.chinese: 三幢歐式建築在兩座花園的襯托下盡顯高貴典雅之氣。

sentences.english: The Elegance bath is the ultimate de-stresser.
sentences.chinese: “典雅浴缸”是一款終極減壓產品。

sentences.english: Gold-inlaid lacquer ware is elegant and magnificent.
sentences.chinese: 金漆鑲嵌製品，絢麗典雅。

definition: implicit charm in rhyme or sound/hinted appeal/interest
style (of art or literature)/form/one's work style/moral character
